title: 1.7.10空岛问题
author: xiao_xiao_chuan
txt_content: 为什么在别人空岛用不了 拔刀 技能也不能放 在别人岛上也不能吃东西 踩压力板 求解决

replies.author: Freeze_Dolphin
replies.txt_content: 岛主在自己的岛屿上打/island settings可以打开对外的权限设置

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
空岛是有权限控制的
需要空岛主人给予你一定的权限之类的
具体操作需要看是什么空岛插件

replies.author: xiao_xiao_chuan
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-21 16:45
空岛是有权限控制的
需要空岛主人给予你一定的权限之类的
具体操作需要看是什么空岛插件 ...
ASKyBlock 我想设置成默认的

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
X_jianchuan1 发表于 2020-7-21 16:46
ASKyBlock 我想设置成默认的
压力板的话
在config.yml
找到PRESSURE_PLATE改成true即可
其它的好像没有控制这个的权限啊

replies.author: xiao_xiao_chuan
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-21 16:45
空岛是有权限控制的
需要空岛主人给予你一定的权限之类的
具体操作需要看是什么空岛插件 ...
咋解决。。。

replies.author: xiao_xiao_chuan
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-21 16:50
压力板的话
在config.yml
找到PRESSURE_PLATE改成true即可
不能吃东西和用拔刀咋回事

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
X_jianchuan1 发表于 2020-7-21 16:50
不能吃东西和用拔刀咋回事island:
     # Allow visitor anvil use
     ANVIL: true
     # Allow visitor armor stand use (1.8+ only)
     ARMOR_STAND: false
     # Allow visitor beacon use
     BEACON: false
     # Allow visitor bed use
     BED: false
     # Allow visitor block breaking, or other damage
     BREAK_BLOCKS: false
     # Allow visitor animal breeding
     BREEDING: false
     # Allow visitor use of cauldrons and brewing stands
     BREWING: false
     # Allow visitor access chests of any kind, droppers, dispensers and hoppers
     CHEST: false
     # Allow visitors to use crafting benches
     CRAFTING: true
     # Allow visitor use of doors or trapdoors. Not including redstone activations.
     DOOR: true
     # Allow visitor chicken egg throwing
     EGGS: false
     # Allow visitors to use enchanting tables
     ENCHANTING: true
     # Allow visitor furnace use
     FURNACE: true
     # Allow gate use
     GATE: true
     # Allow use of jukeboxes and note blocks
     MUSIC: false
     # Allow portal use by visitors
     PORTAL: true
     # Allow pressure plate activation by visitors (players only)
     PRESSURE_PLATE: false
     # Allow adjustment of diodes or comparators
     REDSTONE: false
     # Allow visitors to shear sheep
     SHEARING: false复制代码
你把这几个都改成true试试？

replies.author: xiao_xiao_chuan
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-21 16:52
你把这几个都改成true试试？
不行 找到汉化的了 里面都不是
